headline: onsemi Achieves Validation of Near-Term Science-Based Emissions Reduction Targets
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., February 04, 2025--What’s New: The Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi) has approved onsemi’s near-term science-based emissions reduction targets. The validation of these targets attests that the planned decrease of onsemi’s greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions is aligned to the ambition of limiting global temperature rise to 1.5° Celsius.
